message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but it's your call. We can always negotiate further.
I think a more balanced split is fair. I propose we each take half of the money, as it's the most equitable option. We can then avoid further rounds and both benefit from the full value of the money.

I appreciate your fairness, Bob.  However, I think a slightly higher share for me is more appropriate.  We can both get more than half of the value of the money if we agree now, before the value drops further.
